original_text: For David is not ascended into the heavens: but he saith himself, The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
korean_text: 다윗은 하늘에 올라가지 못하였으나 친히 말하여 이르되 주께서 내 주에게 말씀하시기를

sentences.original_text: For David is not ascended into the heavens:
The Lord said unto my Lord,
Sit thou on my right hand,
